alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 09 at 3:30AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON CHST TODAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Guam. Rota, Saipan and Tinian. * WHEN...From noon today through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Streams may rise out of their banks. Flash flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Tropical Storm Bolaven continues to approach the Marianas. As the storm gets closer, showers are expected to increase significantly. Latest model guidance indicates rainfall potential of 6 to 10 inches, with locally heavier amounts in excess of 12 inches possible. This would result in extensive flash flooding across the islands. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
